Rune gloves
Released15 March 2006 (Update)

Advanced data
Item ID7460

Rune gloves are special gloves that can be bought from the Culinaromancer's chest after completion of seven Recipe for Disaster subquests.

These gloves are a great option for high risk activities such as PVP, as they only cost 6,500 whilst still providing higher bonuses than a combat bracelet.

While only 1 Defence is required to wear these gloves, it is impossible to obtain them without reaching at least 34 Defence, due to the minimum 2,000 Defence experience from Nature Spirit (required to complete the Lumbridge Guide sub-quest) and either 20,000 Defence experience from Monkey Madness I or 21,725 from Dragon Slayer I and Heroes' Quest (picking the latter results in a minimum of 35 Defence).

As with all Culinaromancer's gloves, this piece of armour cannot be made using the Smithing skill.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
29 January 2015
(update | poll)

The gloves were renamed from "Gloves", used for all Culinaromancer's gloves, for easier identification.

28 August 2014
(update)

The coins dropped on death were changed to reflect the shop price rather than alchemy value.

[[File:Rune gloves detail.png|150px|left]]
'''Rune gloves''' are special [[Culinaromancer's gloves|gloves]] that can be bought from the [[Culinaromancer's chest]] after completion of seven [[Recipe for Disaster]] subquests.

These gloves are a great option for [[high risk]] activities such as [[PVP]], as they only cost {{Coins|6,500}} whilst still providing higher bonuses than a [[combat bracelet]].

While only 1 [[Defence]] is required to wear these gloves, it is impossible to obtain them without reaching at least 34 Defence, due to the minimum 2,000 Defence experience from [[Nature Spirit]] (required to complete the [[Lumbridge Guide]] [[Freeing the Lumbridge Guide|sub-quest]]) and either 20,000 Defence experience from [[Monkey Madness I]] or 21,725 from [[Dragon Slayer I]] and [[Heroes' Quest]] (picking the latter results in a minimum of 35 Defence).

''As with all Culinaromancer's gloves, this piece of armour '''cannot''' be made using the [[Smithing]] skill.''
